rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel copy.displayoptions, set oobrestricted to false
on the last expression added the following towards the end (right after 'screen.id in $L.displayoptionBfr2=$L.newID'):

This is so the trigger doesn't have duplicate key problems adding the displayoptions. The new displayoption triggers will only create a new and unique 'id' if the field is null. Therefore, we need to make sure it is NULL before the displayoptions are added.
on the last expression added the following towards the end (right after 'screen.id in $L.displayeventBfr2=$L.newID'):

This is so the trigger doesn't have duplicate key problems adding the displayevents. The new displayevent triggers will only create a new and unique 'id' if the field is null. Therefore, we need to make sure it is NULL before the displayevents are added.

on the last expression added the following towards the end (right after 'screen.id in $L.displayoptionBfr2=$L.newID'):

This is so the trigger doesn't have duplicate key problems adding the displayoptions. The new displayoption triggers will only create a new and unique 'id' if the field is null. Therefore, we need to make sure it is NULL before the displayoptions are added.
on the last expression added the following towards the end (right after 'screen.id in $L.displayeventBfr2=$L.newID'):

This is so the trigger doesn't have duplicate key problems adding the displayevents. The new displayevent triggers will only create a new and unique 'id' if the field is null. Therefore, we need to make sure it is NULL before the displayevents are added.
